user_question: What was the most surprising moment at the 2023 Galactic Music Awards?
final_answer: The most surprising moment at the 2023 Galactic Music Awards was when a holographic performance of a long-deceased artist was unexpectedly interrupted by a technical glitch, causing the hologram to freeze mid-performance.
